creditline: Gift of the John C. Weber Collection
dimension:
13 15/16 × 9 1/4 in. (35.4 × 23.5 cm) (image, each half)
14 5/8 × 10 in. (37.1 × 25.4 cm) (sheet, each half)
markings: Artist’s seal: 芳年之印 {Yoshitoshi no in} | Carver’s seal: 彫工円活 {horikō Enkatsu}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Sketches by Yoshitoshi (Yoshitoshi manga 芳年漫画)
title: Picture of the demon disguised as an old woman begging to see her arm six days after Watanabe Tsuna had returned with it to Kyoto on the 9th day of the 4th lunar month 976
